name: Power of Three
description:
3 friends with supernatural powers on a dangerous jungle island: Paul, John and Nick.

They grew up together. They developed their abilities together. They already helped a lot of people. They fought monsters many times.

Unfortunately, their magic school master JoJo is ill. Friends spent a lot of time to find the cure. They found info about possible cure on one of the magic islands in the world. And they started to search such islands and investigate them. It's been a long time but they are not done yet.

The game shows the small episode of their adventures.
